Disabled: Setting to true disables the module
EditFileNameWithoutExtension: If true, only filename can be changed when renaming file while extension is kept intact
ShowCommonSettings: If true, allow for changing basic settings of files functionality, such as enabling table view and preview pane
ServerUrlRewriteBase: Used for providing short URLs e.g. for file downloads, requires supplying rewrite rules in webserver config
ShowFilesApps: Enables displaying information on desktop and mobile file storage apps in Files tab of Settings screen
BottomLeftCornerLinks: Defines custom links shown at the bottom of left pane in Files
AvailableFor: Automatically provide this feature if one of the listed modules is requested by the entry point
PublicLinksEnabled: If true, allows for creating basic Public links in addition to secure ones
FilesSortBy: Defines a set of rules for sorting files and folders. Filename|Size|Modified. DefaultSortOrder - Asc|Desc
